mapper.select: select SID, CORPID, ORDERID, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, ORDERNUM, COSTPRICE, SELLPRICE, AMOUNT, CUSTOMERID, ORDERTIME, STORAGEID, STORAGE, LOCATIONID, LOCATION, ALERTFLAG, SHOPTYPE, UPDATEFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, FLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, PRODUCTSAVENUM, PRODUCTORDERNUM, PRODUCTALERTNUM, PRODUCTPIC1, TRADEID, TRANSACTIONID, ORIGINSELLPRICE, MONEYTYPE, GROUPID, WEIGHT, WEIGHTAMOUNT, FINALVALUEFEE, ORIGINSELLMONEY, ORIGINEXPRESSMONEY, ORIGINFINALVALUEFEE, ORIGINGIFTMONEY, DESCR1, DESCR2, DESCR3, SHOPTYPEID, EBAYITEMID, ENGLISHNAME from db_amazonsell where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SID, CORPID, ORDERID, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, ORDERNUM, COSTPRICE, SELLPRICE, AMOUNT, CUSTOMERID, ORDERTIME, STORAGEID, STORAGE, LOCATIONID, LOCATION, ALERTFLAG, SHOPTYPE, UPDATEFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, FLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, PRODUCTSAVENUM, PRODUCTORDERNUM, PRODUCTALERTNUM, PRODUCTPIC1, TRADEID, TRANSACTIONID, ORIGINSELLPRICE, MONEYTYPE, GROUPID, WEIGHT, WEIGHTAMOUNT, FINALVALUEFEE, ORIGINSELLMONEY, ORIGINEXPRESSMONEY, ORIGINFINALVALUEFEE, ORIGINGIFTMONEY, DESCR1, DESCR2, DESCR3, SHOPTYPEID, EBAYITEMID, ENGLISHNAME from db_amazonsell
